website_summaries.verdict: For the price, this case is tough to beat.  Available in a number of vibrant colors and made of durable hard plastic for dent and scratch protection.
pros: Slim, lightweight case is easy to grip thanks to a rubberized matte  finish
Easy to put on with full access to all ports and functions
Apple logo shines through, which is important to many proud owners
cons: Some owners have reported problems with feet falling off

customer_reviews.title: Great! Love the matte feel of it!
customer_reviews.text: Got it in Shell Cover - Pink. true to the color. it has a matte finish very smooth~ all ports are accessible. no fingerprints show up but if you have a little grease or oily hands it will leave finger prints on it. but could easily be wiped off. mine didnt come with the kuzy logo i love it that way better~! apple logo shows thought great!~ top case is very difficult to take off thought! really love this case though!
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this case
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this case. Plus I received it 2 days early! It's a really nice shade of purple, snaps on great, and you can see the apple logo lit up perfectly! The only flaw I've noticed is it makes the top half of your laptop kind of heavy so if you want it set back a little bit, it tends to go all the way back if that makes any sense.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nucci

customer_reviews.title: So nice cover!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Kuzy-AIR 13 -inch Black Rubberized Hard Case for MacBook Air 13.3, color black, for my A1466 model which I bought this month of August 2018 from Amazon because of its fine texture and good looking. This cover really fits and protects my apple mac air laptop. I observed that though it has a cover already it still fit to my new Laptop Sleeve Felt Protective case for MacBook Air. My eldest son likes it also for his own MacBook Air 13" and he wants to order this cover with a red color through me, soon.
customer_reviews.author: Illuminado

customer_reviews.title: Better Quality than Speck!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a Macbook case ever since my $50 Speck case cracked within a month. I purchased this case because of the high ratings and I am so glad I did! The quality of this product feels 10x better than my Speck case and I love that it is rubberized! I also ordered the matching keyboard cover, together I spent $32 and free shipping wth Prime, way cheaper than Speck! I highly recommend this quality product!
customer_reviews.author: S.D

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect when I got this, but after opening it and putting it on my laptop I love it! It does just snap on to your laptop so it took just a few seconds to put on. I love the color so much! And it feels nice Also! I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit properly. 2017 MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: Looks alright, and feel is nice, but fitment is awful. The front left portion of the case does not latch properly, all of the other notches fit properly except one.... which allows debris and dirt to get between the computer and case. Its honestly not worth the $6 amazon wants to charge for return shipping. My wifes MacBook Pro case from Kuzy fits perfectly.. just not mine for the 2017 MacBook Air. Maybe this was just a bad case?
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Latest version has gone downhill - look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I've always had very good experience with these Kuzy cases - I think this is my fourth. But the most recent one I received (in navy blue if that matters) doesn't fit perfectly like the ones before it. The bottom panel doesn't click into place on the front right side of the computer - the plastic piece is too short on that side and is missing the lip that allows it to snap onto the base of the computer. I don't have the patience to ship it back but I'm sure it won't last long and I'll be seeking another brand despite good experiences in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Black MacBook Air Case Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Matte black looks sleek on my MacBook air. I have had the case for a few weeks and it has worked great so far. Like other reviews say, it does in fact show fingerprints. I however don't think they are obvious and can probably be cleaned easily. The case does have a few scratches so far, but they are barely visible. Overall love the case and would buy another/ recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Great color !!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color the feel is great for the rubberized case and it gives me full range opening and closing my MacBook Air 13"
customer_reviews.author: Sabina S.

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd one for a new laptop...best money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: These cases are the best value for the money, bar none. My original one bounced around through endless international trips, camping, etc., fell I don't even know how many times! Rock solid, withstood tons of beatings with only minor cracks here and there...but lasted for years and saved my Macbook Air each time. Thanks to my old Kuzy case, my Macbook still looks completely brand new! These cases are made of just-soft-enough-to-avoid-scratches polymer (aka. plastic) yet plenty durable to protect your investment. For the people crying about cracks...what do you think is better? A crack or a busted laptop? lol
customer_reviews.author: American Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made. I dropped it once and it didn't even crack. Awesome. Kuzy seems to be better well made than other brands I've tried. Hot Blue is more of a turquoise color and not quite as vibrant as what my screen is showing..which is perfect. It also stays on my computer better than other brands and doesn't keep having to be snapped back on. It's never fallen off.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and great cover
customer_reviews.text: I love my cover. I got the frost white (I wanted my decal to show through) and both the decal and light from the Apple symbol shine through. Super easy to put on. I also got the keyboard cover and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Easton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome case fits like a glove heres my youtube video i made
customer_reviews.author: Tony Pazo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third cover I've used on my MacBook, and the first from Kuzy, so I feel that I have a few others to compare against. The color is a bit brighter than I expected, but it's not so far off that it doesn't look similar at all. The case fits exactly as expected, and protects well (note: this protects against scratches and bumps. It will NOT protect your MacBook against falls and drops). It does have a bit of a "stickier" surface than other cases I've used, but not quite as "sticky" as I expected. Overall, I like this case and am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case. Love the color. It fits perfectly. We'll see how it holds up over time but so far I'm extremely impressed with this high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: JambiJ

customer_reviews.title: Great protective shell for the Macbook
customer_reviews.text: I have used Kuzy 3 years back and they have lasted quite well and long. Was very happy with the earlier one, so I bought this one again. Purple color came really good and love the grip. Thoroughly recommend. Great product again!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Product Guy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap piece of plastic - DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is the single worst item I have ever ordered from Amazon. Rubberized? BS. It's a thin, cheap piece of plastic that will do nothing to protect your laptop from anything other than surface scratches. If it didn't cost more than it's worth to return it I would do so. It hit the recycle pile earlier today. Do not buy, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Meifert

customer_reviews.title: Good case at a great price, but.....
customer_reviews.text: This case is fine despite the seller's fears that I don't know how to order the correct accessories for my computer. Unsure why they needed to email me with their concerns the day the product was to be delivered because Amazon has an excellent and easy to use return system even if they do not think so. Hopefully this case will last longer than the last one from a different manufacturer and seller. Fit is fine and the texture is great, it doesn't feel like it wants to squirt out of my hands.
customer_reviews.author: the loosest bigger

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: A good case. I have two things to say: #1: You probably see all these reviews saying the rubber feet always come unglued. I think Kuzy also saw these reviews, because the rubber feet are no longer even glued in. They’re snapped into place. I don’t see them ever coming out. #2: This case does not have a rubberized feel. It’s more of a matte finish type feel - but in no way does it feel or look like those cheap, shiny, super plastic-y looking cases. However, if you’re looking for something with a lot of grip, this isn’t it. Overall 5/5 for me Update: This case is prone to fingerprint marks. They can be removed easily with a babywipe.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Stephens

customer_reviews.title: I loved the feel and fit of this case
customer_reviews.text: I loved the feel and fit of this case. It fits my MacBook Air 13.3" perfectly. I then bought the Mosiso package and discarded their case, but kept the keyboard color and screen protector. I am not sure why Kuzy sells a wine case without a wine keyboard color to match. Oh well. I am pretty pleased with the cover and items from Mosiso. I just wish Kuzy made a set to make it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Kuzy product - I now have one for my work and personal Macs. I love it! I have a tendency to slide my laptops in bookbags or large totes with a disregard for what else may be in there, so it's nice not to have to worry about notebooks or pen caps scratching them.
customer_reviews.author: Kiely582

customer_reviews.title: Initially it was working OK with a good fit. Later it started breaking and cracking in ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially it was working OK with a good fit. Later it started breaking and cracking in the corners and the rubber pieces fell off as well. I contacted customer care and they told me to take pictures which I did and I sent it to them and they never replied to me even after emailing them again. Overall I'd recommend a better product than this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this with the keyboard cover and it's better than I expected. Packaged great and arrived right on time. Very easy to place on and the color (I ordered neon pink) is VERY VERY VIBRANT. I have pictures posted and the apple sign is actually more "white" then the pinkish/purple color. That was my flash. Worth every penny and the material is amazing. Durable and rubberized so it's not that hard uncomfortable plastic material.
customer_reviews.author: Janina Profit

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had on my macbook air for a few hours, but so far I love it! I ordered the mint color and it's definitely true to color. I also love the soft texture of the case, and it looks great on my mac! The fit of the bottom piece does seem a little bit off, but I rushed to put it on so I'll probably try to adjust it later. I'll update if the problem persists!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top case fits just fine, bottom case is another story.
customer_reviews.text: While the top case fits perfectly, the bottom case doesn't fit snugly no matter what you do. If you manage to clip the bottom clips near the trackpad, the clips near the vents will not clip, thus leaving a gap where dust can slip through. However, if you manage to clip those instead, then the bottom clips won't, leaving a gap near the trackpad where, you guessed it, dust can fall into. Damned if you do, damned if you don't. Based on other reviews and my own experience with installing it I don't have a lot of confidence with this product. At least one part of it fits, so it isn't all that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Bluetooth McGee

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: MacBook Air's are tough machines to cover with a hard case since there seems to be no way to grab the back of the computer. Nevertheless, this Kuzy is holding just perfect to my laptop. One thing that I believe can be improved is to try and cover all of the sides of the computer (see photo attached). If I push the case against the laptop the case does cover it up so this means probably that a couple of those clamping pieces of plastic would better snap into the computer and make the hard case to cover the whole side of the computer
customer_reviews.author: O. MORENO

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this MacBook Air cover. It's a matte finish and looks very high end - goes so well with an Apple esthetic. Kuzy sent the cover within 2 days of the order and all was as they advertised it to be. So...very happy with my purchase and the price was very fair. Would recommend Kuzy Mac covers to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Mahadeva

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for a week now. I was a little skeptical buying a brand I'd never heard of and that was so cheap. Part of me felt that buying a more expensive one = more protection for my laptop. And while I haven't dropped it yet to see how the case performs, it feels pretty durable. It's got a classy shine to it, clipped on super easy, and I'm just overall totally happy with it! Would recommend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Warren

customer_reviews.title: Lasted almost 6 years
customer_reviews.text: Have had this cover on my MacBook Air for almost 6 years now. Has been everywhere - travel, work, home, around kids, around me (not always gentle). Was super skeptical of it at first and some parts (like the rubber feet) didn't last long, but overall for this to have lasted almost 6 years is a total win. Replacing it because the edges that hook on have come off in some places. Still works but is less secure. (PS: I hardly ever write reviews for as much as I buy on Amazon. Had to give this product some kudos!)
customer_reviews.author: mirandamac80

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: I really shouldn't complain about this case. For the price, I think it is a good deal as far as something to protect my Macbook Air, but I wish it was a little more rugged. I was hoping the material would be a little thicker and, though it snaps onto the Macbook easily, I worry that in time it will not fit so well and may fall off. It's looks nice and does provide protection. I think it is worth the asking price, but I would've gladly spent more money for something a little tougher.
customer_reviews.author: bed685

customer_reviews.title: nice, easy to use keyboard cover
customer_reviews.text: The item is quite functional as a way of personalizing your computer and giving it some color and some protection. You get used to the difference in feel within two minutes and don't even notice the difference in your keys. I really like it and does give some protection from crumbs, dust and damp fingers. I'm getting others for family members. I also am please with the company in that they immediately emailed me when I placed the order to make sure I'd chosen the right size and gave me the opportunity to adjust the order as needed and followed up with me to make sure I was pleased with it. BRAVI!
customer_reviews.author: NJB

customer_reviews.title: Decent Cover that retains fingerprints
customer_reviews.text: Upon buying this item I did read quite a bit about the fingerprints. Until I had started to use it I realize its a bit bothersome. If you're not a neat freak like I am maybe it shouldnt bother you . It takes some thorough wiping down to remove them at times. Overall case works fine and fits snug enough to protect laptop. You have access to all your plugs and speakers work fine. It's just the annoying smudges that persist to collect. Overall a three star product, since it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Nice clear cover for MacBook Air A1466
customer_reviews.text: Received the cover yesterday (on time) and installed on my MacBook Air A1466. Snug fit and looks nice. No instructions but it wasn’t tough figuring it out. A second set of hands would have been helpful when removing the protective plastic. I would recommend using a clean counter with a towel to hold the laptop. Install the screen cover first from the top and clip it in place at the hinges. Same for the bottom. Ensure the laptop is clear from dust and lint.
customer_reviews.author: John from Utah

customer_reviews.title: Fits as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Cover fits perfectly! Did have small crack near edge on top cover when I received it. I didn't bother returning it b/c it still provides protection for my MacBook Air
customer_reviews.author: Bill Strange

customer_reviews.title: Great product, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought the royal blue cover and love it. Item was just as described and fit my MacBook Air perfectly. It is soft to the touch with a nice matte look and smooth rubber feel. The case is hard and protects both the top and bottom of the laptop very well. Instructions were clear and easy to follow. Parts just clip on and stay on. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anais H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: This case is thin enough to not be clunky but still covers my mac air so it stays nice and protected from scratches, etc. I don't think this case would hold up to drops or heavy usage when carrying around in a backpack or something, but I think it would be necessary to have another outer layer of protection if you are going to be using it for traveling a lot. At least I will be doing so. I purchased the 'clear' case and I do love the look of it because you can still see the mac itself.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking - this is the case you need!
customer_reviews.text: I’m the mom of a one-year-old, so to take time to write this review speaks volumes. This is such a sleek case, even though I have dented the corners and dropped my Mac several times before - it hides everything. You could have told me this cost 69.99 at the Mac store and I would believe it. Easy to snap on and the rubber grippers work fantastic. I got it in the dark grey/black - the apple logo is still visible. Fingerprints do show but wipe up nicely. Soft to the touch. Would buy again 10x over!
customer_reviews.author: S. Loukota

customer_reviews.title: Great Case for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I really love this case. It is crystal clear and fits perfectly. It is very slim, almost like it is not even there which is what I was hoping for since I didn't want it to be bulky. The case fits very snug and I had no problem putting it on. It's a wonderful hard shell case for the price and I like the quality. I would definitely purchase from this company again. The only thing that I wish was different about this case is the Kuzy name/logo on the top of the case, it's hardly noticeable but the name is already on the bottom case so I wish the top was completely logo/name free.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Kuzy - 13-inch Black Case for MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: I must say i love this case, i ordered it on Sunday and its here on Wed. it wasn't expecting to be here until the 6th! it has a really nice feel, it adds a bit of weight to the air but that is a plus because it felt a little too light a times. it completely covers the air, and doesn't interfere with typing. I bought the case to cover up a ding in the upper right hand corner of the air and it does a great job, i hardly notice it. I think i'm in LOVE ; ) Thank U!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kid

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: I received the hard case a few days ago. I am extremely pleased with it. As the other reviews mention, the case is a hard plastic shell with a rubberzied layer on top; providing the perfect amount of grip without being too "sticky". I opted for the white/clear color. I actually forget that I have the case on the Mac as the silver shines through quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Not great for heavy usage
customer_reviews.text: I was really not super happy with this case. Almost immediately the tabs that held it to my laptop started to fall off, even though I had never tried to remove it. The grips on the bottom also fell off after only a few weeks. After several months, the cloudy top layer on the plastic started to peel giving it a sickly, worn appearance with clear plastic sticking out. Maybe it was just the purple color, but I bought a different brand when I replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Artie

customer_reviews.title: Quality Case - Great Feel
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the quality of the case. It had a soft rubber feel to it yet it was pretty solid and durable. Despite it having a rubber feel to it, it was thick but overtime I dropped it and one of the tabs broke off. I ordered a different one from a different company that has an overall more hard plastic feel and you can tell the quality is just not the same. I'll be ordered another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: A little weird to put on and I thought it was on a couple times and it slipped off until I figured it out, but once it’s on it’s pretty great! A pet peeve of mine is that the Apple logo may look a little fuzzy on full brightness and I love my laptop on full brightness. Otherwise, it’s a nice sturdy cover and I love the circles on the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Add A Different Look to Your MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: I got this cover for my MacBook Air! It give my machine an aggressive look and keeps the Aluminum unibody clean and scratch free. Would I recommend it?? Absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: Warhammer 0369

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise I like the color and how you can still see the ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got this for my MacBook air 13.3". It seems to fit well, except there are areas that aren't snug to my laptop. Specifically the bottom case, towards the left front. Otherwise I like the color and how you can still see the Apple cover when its on.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Fit should be better
customer_reviews.text: The case is thin and not at all soft. The bottom half of the case does not clip into position as it should. It was advertised for my model of MacBook Air. The top half of the case fits well. Recommend considering a different protective case. This case was wrapped in sealed plastic, so it was a new case. Should be a better fit to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: G.W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome in every way for a fraction of the price! I have bought several of these since the MacBook Air came out and I have beven very happy every time. Actually 1st time I bought the cover from Apple which broke within months then found these and I have never looked back!
customer_reviews.author: AEGOZCUE

customer_reviews.title: Great MacBook Air shell case.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this shell case for my 2017 MacBook Pro. It fit perfectly. I purchased the case in black. I like how the Apple logo illuminates through the case.! Very cool. Have to wait and see how it holds up but for now I’m giving it 5 stars. On a side note, I am impressed with this company’s customer service. They seen very interested in receiving honest feedback. I would definitely consider purchasing future products from them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea A Leuschner

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: A bit hard to disassemble, but super amazing. Gives my laptop a nice matte look and bottom grips are of the highest quality. 5 stars all around. Recommended to all. Make sure your model number matches this case.
customer_reviews.author: jhonny p.

customer_reviews.title: Ratings high.....my opinion low.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit securely on my Macbook Air. The retention points move out of position easily and do not stay in place......mostly on the bottom trackpad side which gets the most "handling". I installed this yesterday and messed with the included feet for quite some time but it did not help the situation. Rather annoying for such a simple design. It may be mine specifically but there is not a whole lot of wiggle room in the design. Even if it fit securely now, Im sure it would not last very long.
customer_reviews.author: groovatron

customer_reviews.title: does not add much more grip than metal case
customer_reviews.text: I got this specifically to add some grip to my Air since I've nearly dropped it many times. Apple likes to make their cases as smooth and slippery as possible. Some other reviews say this adds some grip, but I don't see it. It's just barely less slippery than the Air's metal case. Other than that, this case appears to be a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: I really like this!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today and I am very pleased. It all snapped into place quite easily. yet firmly and it includes the black foam rubber pads for the bottom which also fit very nicely and again easy to install. I bought the clear case, I like how it keeps the classic look of the macbook air without much added weight but with the added protection. It was inexpensive, a real win--I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M.  Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved my case!! It's so smooth and fits my laptop very well. I would definitely buy another case from this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Bados

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to protect my MacBook Air. And the price was an extra bonus real low compared to cost of the first one bought in 2012. Just about 50% of the cast of that first one. Fits like a glove to protect the computer. Glad to find this product for such a good bargain. And may I ad it looks very nice on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is solid, but color is really less bright and saturate as on picture. Anyway, it helps to protect an MBA very good, making it slightly heavier. Recently I've ordered the same item but in black, for my own forthcoming MBA :)
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: not at all what i was expecting
customer_reviews.text: i was very excited to revieve this case for my mac, but my excitement soon turned into disappointment as i unwrapped the case. i was expecting a solid black case, but instead recieved an off grey case. along with the case not being true to color, the apple sign that lights up on my mac is blurry due to the loose fit. reading the reviews, i was sure that i had found my ideal case, but instead i recieved exactly what i didn’t want in a case
customer_reviews.author: destiny

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new cover! The color is great and it fits so well onto my macbook air. I especially love how smooth it feels. I don't usually write a lot of reviews, but this case is worth the time to share. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: We have bought 4 of these for 4 laptops and continue to appreciate the quality. Would be great to have patterns too ... I believe they only have solid colors but I could be mistaken. My younger daughter got the light pink and she loves it. Very pretty. My husband and I have the black and my older daughter has the clear.
customer_reviews.author: ACA

customer_reviews.title: seemed like a good cover
customer_reviews.text: I didn't end up keeping this cover but it arrived unbroken in a timely manner. The color was as expected and the fit was perfect, super easy to put on and take off. The only thing I didn't like is that it was much more opaque than it claimed. I was barely able to see the apple light through the plastic and not able to see my stickers at all. It seemed like a great cover but I wanted something more transparent. Return and refund was a breeze with this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Boudicca

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a pretty stylish protective case. I’ve never dropped my laptop so I can’t say much on the protection and durability of the product. I felt that the case did add some noticeably significant weight, and as someone who walks around with it in my backpack, that can be quite tiring, so that knocked off a star from my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Air 13” black rubberized case
customer_reviews.text: I bought the matted black color one and I like how soft and smooth It is. I would give it all five stars if it weren’t for the fit. For some reason the bottom half of the case does not completely fit the bottom part of my laptop. So sometimes I would fiddle with it and just try press it in, but it would pop out. Additionally, kue to keep in my. If you buy the black one be in mind if your hands are dirty and/or oily. It will leave fingerprints on it. Other than that, I do like the color and the texture of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Dompas

customer_reviews.title: Very good cover
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth, soft feel to the finish. Appears to be sturdy and durable. Has rubber bumpers on the bottom to prevent sliding across slick surfaces. Opaque color is pretty but allows the Apple logo to show through. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Silvergirl

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I've had several Kuzy's and they've all cracked on the corners. Crappy, brittle plastic. There's got to be a better alternative. I had the hammered plastic cover a few years ago and it was bullet proof. The plastic they use now seems to be way cheaper and more brittle. The only saving grace was that they're cheap.
customer_reviews.author: B1R

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best computer case i've had. It is long lasting and its shiny finish is super pretty. I've had it for about a year now and it is still in perfect conditions. It is a little cracked from the sides, but that is only because my computer has fallen twice, and it protected it from getting damaged. The only thing I do not like is that it is super hard to take off without breaking. It makes it difficult to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice clear case, my son likes it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Works well on my son's MacBook Air and he likes it a lot but hoping it holds up as the Kuzy cases I bought for MacBook Pro have all broken rather easily whenever I try to change them out. My last one the bottom cracked just picking it up so I have not been impressed with them for my laptop. Hopefully this one will be the exception.
customer_reviews.author: trynabehealthy

customer_reviews.title: Kuzy Kares ( cares )
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. They even emailed me before delivery to make sure I ordered the right one because it’s a 2012 model. But it was the right one and fit . Feels really good. Has a slight rubbery feel so it’s not real slick when handling .
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne R.

customer_reviews.title: Love the case, but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this case - it's slim, hugs and protects my MacBook, and doesn't add unnecessary bulk or weight. It still fits in its sleeve easily, and the Apple logo shines through very nicely! My only complaint is that it shows fingerprints very easy, which is odd since the case has a matte finish, and I cannot get them to go away. I have tried multiple cleaning products and towels, but the fingerprints never go away.
customer_reviews.author: Joey L

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for Macbook Air early 2015 model
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Macbook Air July 2015, Model No. A1466. This fits perfectly and is a beautiful softly saturated lilac color. The case snapped on easily. No complaints besides the unnecessarily large box and extra packing materials it came in but that's Amazon's deal.
customer_reviews.author: labkid2009

customer_reviews.title: great protection, tricky to remove
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Kuzy shell for my older MacBook Air. I just got another one because I wanted a different color. My old one was still serviceable with only one small crack on the bottom shell, but really, for the price, I have been very pleased with it. It's protected my laptop as intended. The only gripe is it's kind of tricky to get to top shell off, but I managed it eventually haha. I'm sure there is a trick to it I was missing. I like the way this cover looks and it's not bulky at all. Also, the little rubber feet are good for making it stay put.
customer_reviews.author: aerowell

customer_reviews.title: Durable lite case
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I transport my laptop daily to work and each case I have bought lasts about a year before the edges crack off and it needs to be replaced. Most importantly it protects my air from being scratched and damaged. My only criticism is that the rubber feel peel over after a couple of months. I think i might peel them off at the beginning and crazy glue them on this time.
customer_reviews.author: GoldCoast

customer_reviews.title: Durable and 5 start other than ill-fitting bottom
customer_reviews.text: This MacBook case seems to be very solid and it of nice construction, but the only problem that I have with it is that the bottom edge in the front of the laptop is somewhat ill-fitting. The clip thingies at the edge sort of slip off of the laptop from use, it still stays put, but comes off the edge slightly. it is nothing super bad, so I am keeping it to protect my laptop but it is a major design flaw that should not have happened so I'm giving 3 stars to an otherwise 5 star worthy product
customer_reviews.author: Dl

customer_reviews.title: is much better. They created a 'shell' to place the rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally Kuzy produced a hard case that last!! I have had others and the first thing that happened is lose the rubber base and the PC starts sliding on the surfaces. Now, this one, is much better. They created a 'shell' to place the rubber base and now is not going anywhere. The quality also is much better than others. I really don't know if this is related to the crystal clear only, but if it is, better modify all others tone like this one. good job!!! love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the same case and am very happy with my purchase. I had this case in orange and it lasted for 5 years! I love the red- I wanted a case that is easy to see as sometimes I set my laptop down somewhere weird and having a bright color helps me to find it again. Will buy another case for my daughter's laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J Acker

customer_reviews.title: Eh, it’s not bad but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of it and it does make my computer feel heavier which to me makes it feel like it’s protected. It does occasionally need to be resnapped in certain places and it’s kinda annoying that you have to do this but who knows. I am upset however because I just received this not even a week ago and one of the rubber feet has already popped out and of course I’m not sure where this happened at so now my computer doesn’t sit evenly. Hopefully I’ll be able to find something to makeshift.
customer_reviews.author: sgirl

customer_reviews.title: If needed, I'd buy another.
customer_reviews.text: This case is what I've been looking for to protect my iMac Notebook. Though not the most expensive piece of equipment in my electronic apparatus stock, it did make a dent in my pocketbook. For that alone, this case will protect my device's appearance and value. Its fully rubberized and has rubber feet, for a complete non-slip grip experience.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: It looks good. The color is slightly darker then in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received this in the mail. It looks good. The color is slightly darker then in the pic... but that is to be expected. fit my mac air 13" nicely. It feels smooth and macbook air doesn't feel so slippery.
customer_reviews.author: sd

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Color
customer_reviews.text: I got the case in the wine red color and it came out to really pretty. The case snaps on easily and seems to be made well. The case does get smudged or dirty by finger prints especially if there is something oily on your fingers but it wipes away really easily
customer_reviews.author: Sena Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the brand new computer looking brand new
customer_reviews.text: We recently got a brand new computer--very similar to a computer we already own. This cover serves double duty--helps protect the new computer from getting scratched up and also helps quickly identify which computer is which. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: D.L.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case!
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a great case--equal to the Speck that is twice the cost. I only gave for stars for durability because I haven't had it long enough to know if/when it will begin to crack at the edges. Previous cases I have owned last about two years with normal use. This looks and feels like it will last at least that long. Perhaps that is just the life expectancy for this type of plastic case. Buy it! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Toni M. Hobgood

customer_reviews.title: Barely lasted six months
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. The case is nice overall-smooth, fits well, very slim profile and easy to attach to computer. I had no problems with the case falling off, anything like that but I bought it in July and it's barely the middle of February and the whole thing is destroyed. The bottom is cracked, missing a piece, and is about ready for the trash. It may have been dropped once, but not to any extent that it should've broken like that. I liked it while it lasted and for the price it's not terrible; just wish it'd lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Berg

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: This is my second KUZY case and they are my favorite. The color I most recently purchased is the black, and it's just the best! It's very elegant. I have gotten a lot of compliments on it at work, and it feels so soft to the touch too. The case also fits my laptop well, better than others I have tried. The other color I had was the turquoise which also was pretty, and lasted a long time. I highly recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Connie G

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pink!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! I thought it might be a bit too bright but as you'll notice by my photo, it's absolutely the perfect pink! The logo is barely noticeable too, which is great. It also shipped super fast. The texture is better than the other brands too, it's definitely a really soft, matte feel. I definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good Mac cover.
customer_reviews.text: Read the top reviews and decided to buy a black one. It fits my Mac Airbook perfectly, I am pretty satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: I like the thinness of this case and have owed several ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the thinness of this case and have owed several of these. However, the case I just received has defects: 1.) the edge of the top case is rough and snags on everything. Every time I place my Macbook Air into my bookbag, it snags the bag. 2.) the rough edge makes it hard to hold. Additionally, the feet to EVERY Kuzy case I have purchased comes off after a couple months of use. Therefore, I usually take them off and superglue them back on as to not lose them. The quality control of the cases seem to be subpar.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Much better than my old case
customer_reviews.text: I had one that had glue-on feet. They came off and left sticky stuff everywhere. The feet on this case are much nicer. No glue and sturdy also. I like the black see thru color. Very snazzy. Sometimes the case gets a little loose, but it doesn't bother me too much yet. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits 98% correctly
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and clean, and material is great but doesn't completely snap in place. Like I'll put it on, and snap them all in place but the front bottom clips slip out of place in a few seconds. It stays on and no one would notice if they're not looking for it, it just mildly bothers me. Still keeping it because honestly I'm to lazy return it and find another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Color shipped was not requested color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the cover in a serenity (pale) blue and received one that was much close to a lavender color (despite the package markings). It also seemed very flimsy relative to my current incase cover (which has cracked some over the past few years, but has protected my computer well). I returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: JRHoly

customer_reviews.title: Rubber feels like plastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because it said rubber, and was looking for a slightly squishy give on the surface/texture. This isn't that. While it may work fine as a cover, it definitely doesn't feel like rubber, but rather like plastic. I'm not about to send it off to some lab for a test or anything, but that's what it feels like to me. Otherwise, it's a completely fine product and I will to use it and see if it ultimately works out for me.
customer_reviews.author: SYB-DLB

customer_reviews.title: It snaps on pretty easily and stays snapped
customer_reviews.text: The case is well constructed and doesn't add bulk to a computer that has none already. It snaps on pretty easily and stays snapped, though in the front near the keyboard, I sometimes have to press it back in. The one issue I have is that that the black rubber pieces on the bottom of the case have come off in just a few weeks. They stick back again, but then will come off. I have resigned to just taking them off. It wont scratch your table or desk, but it would be nice if the black rubber pieces were built into the case and not little sticky pieces that are poorly made and attached
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Received a defective product! Corner cracked and top cover scratch/Knick
customer_reviews.text: So I received the product and very excited because I bought this for my niece (Navy Blue Cover). Initial reaction was nice and I like the bottom black rubber pads not being held by adhesive like others. I realized after installing that the bottom cover (corner) has a deep crack and the top cover had a small scratch which is small but very visible. I reached out to company via email to resolve issue. Will update review based on actions taken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more sounds of minor damage
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. It’s just a hard plastic cover with a rubber feel... just what it claims. I don’t hear the sound of scratching and other minor damage anymore. As much as I thought it was a stupid purchase, I’m glad I did it now.
customer_reviews.author: BW001

customer_reviews.title: Good product, practical and stylish too.
customer_reviews.text: Great and stylish product, the second one I've had, and with its soft-touch surface it's better than the first one—better grip, better protection, sleeker look. The first one lasted two years of heavy use and extensive travel before one of the side-grips cracked, then broke off—with no harm to the computer and still usable, though.a bit iffy. Very good value for my twenty bucks or whatever I paid for it. I recommend this product without reservation, and the color's up to you.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Rafi Zabor

customer_reviews.title: I like this pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I like this pretty well.. it fits nicely, my only issue with it is that I was hoping it would feel a bit more rubbery - or tacky to the touch. It really just feels more like normal plastic. The little black foot nubs on the bottom were more how I was hoping the whole case would feel. But it's not bad. I use my cases on set during films and they go through a lot of abuse. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Kirkeby

customer_reviews.title: Love this case, it was in good condition for about a year
customer_reviews.text: I really like the clean look of this case and it's been super useful to prevent scratches and stuff, and the little feet protect from any spills. After a year, some of the clips have chipped off and all of the rubber feet have fallen off. It's still firmly on the computer though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like the material this case is made out of. It's a little tacky (touch wise) but not too sticky. I know it's not the thickest cover, but my Macbook Air seems a bit more protected now.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: CLASSY
customer_reviews.text: Provides great protection. The color and texture give a fine touch to the MacBook, keeping it classy. Definitely will try other the other colors!
customer_reviews.author: cristian45

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfectly and it looks SOO good. It was the exact orange that I wanted
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly and it looks SOO good. It was the exact orange that I wanted. It does seem like it will be a little difficult to take off, however I don't plan on taking it off for a long time so I'm fine with that. And yes, there are visible fingerprints on the case but it's extremely easy to remove with just a little water and a towel. Overall it's an excellent purchase, you get a quality case for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Not rubberized. It’s a thin hard plastic. Way too big to fit the laptop it advertises.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product zero stars. Not rubberized. Hard plastic. Wouldn’t protect ANYTHING. WAY TOO big for our 13” Laptop. Customer service HORRIBLE. They want PICTURES to prove it doesn’t fit, as well as PICTURES of my laptops’ serial number!!! Before they will do anything!! I’ve been asking for a stupid label to send it back for a refund and they refuse until they get PICTURES! Who does that?? Amazon has so far not helped!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves fingerprints
customer_reviews.text: This laptop case is protective for a clip on and price. However, due to it being rubberized it leaves prints when you touch it to open/close laptop. It is not the worst but not the best either. Laptop case is good for the case but if the appearance of fingerprints bother you, be ready to wipe it down a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jam5544332211

customer_reviews.title: Please Read If Having Doubts
customer_reviews.text: I usually fear buying products online because I'm really too lazy to send it back if it doesn't fit. Especially if its for my Mac, since I'm very protective of it for how expensive it is. But this fits perfectly on my air, and it doesn't block the mic since I have the newest 2014 Air that just came out. It's great. Trust me when I say it fits perfectly, and actually looks really great and thin on the air.. I also have a decal on my air and the case doesn't interfere with it at all. I would DEFINITELY recommend these products to anyone. I also have their screen protector as well, which fits great, too!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

product_meta.title: Kuzy MacBook Air 13 inch Case A1466 A1369 Soft Touch Cover for Older Version 2017, 2016, 2015 Hard Shell - Black
feature_bullets: 【★ OLDER VERSION CASE FOR MACBOOK AIR 13 INCH ★】 Designed to fit MacBook Air 13.3 inch Models A1466 & A1369 - Release 2017 / 2016 / 2015 / 2014 / 2013 / 2012
【 PLASTIC EXTERIOR MATERIAL 】 Hard Plastic Case with Soft Touch Top and Bottom Covers for Silky-Smooth soft-touch * Smooth yet grippy Soft Touch exterior texture

【 CASE SPECIFICATIONS 】 No cut out design, Apple Logo Shine through the case * Design lets you open/close your MacBook Air all the way * Access to all ports, battery check button, USB and SD card ports
【 MACBOOK AIR 13 INCH CASE FEATURES 】 Fully vented for safe heat disbursement * Totally removable -- easy to put on and take off * Protects your MacBook Air from scrapes and scratches

【 MACBOOK AIR CASE COMPATIBLE 】 ONLY with OLDER VERSION MacBook Air 13.3 inch Model A1466 & A1369 -- MQD32LL/A, MQD42LL/A, MMGF2LL/A, MMGG2LL/A, MJVE2LL/A, MJVG2LL/A, MD760LL/B, MD760LL/A, MD761LL/A, MD231LL/A, MD232LL/A, MC503LL/A, MC504LL/A, MC965LL/A, MC966LL/A

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars8,090 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
